QuestData.Title: Tactical Mana Bombs
QuestData.Description: Ah, $p, just the $r I was looking for. I have received another batch of tactical mana bombs that I need planted in key positions across Violet Rise to the southeast.$b$bHere, take these. I do not trust our standard soldiers with such firepower. Oh... and don't shake them, whatever you do.$b$bPlant one of the Kirin Tor ships, another one near their supplies, and the last on the construct they are building.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Tactical Mana Bomb on an Alliance Ship, Alliance Supply Shipment, and on the Construct Ritual.
